content.rendered:
Privacy Policy

Introduction

FundQuest Financial Services Limited (hereinafter referred to as “we”, “us”, or “our”) is a Finance Company licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) to provide financial services through various channels, including our Website, Mobile Application, and Unstructured Supplementary Service Data (USSD). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal data when you use our Services and the choices you have associated with that data.

We use your data to provide and improve our Services to you. By using our Services, you agree to the collection and use of your information in accordance with this Policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, terms used have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions of use.
